content: is this the right place to ping people?
Grahame, who would you like to get ahold of? I can get you Nick Rupley the project lead if you need someone directly on the team.
can you refer the question to him please

Sorry for the delay Grahame. Getting "Sorry, you don't have access to that topic!" on the welcome-to-the-fhir-community-forum/380/2 link. I can view "http://community.fhir.org/t/welcome-to-the-fhir-community-forum/8" just fine.
I'll just pass the link on to Nick and he'll probably be able to see.
don't worry - it's old and in the wrong place. I've asked the user to ask it again in the right place if it's still an issue
